---
title: "Read MATLAB file"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(R.matlab)

dat <- readMat("ME_phase2_excludqnadata_all.mat") 

df <- dat$allqna |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything()) |> 
  unnest(value) |> 
  unnest_wider(value) 

df
```

```{r}
iq <- df |> 
    select(name, iq) |> 
    unnest_wider(iq) |> 
    select(name, score) |> 
    rename(iq = score)

leb <- df |> 
    select(name, leb) |> 
    unnest_wider(leb) |> 
    select(name, score) |> 
    rename(leb = score)

all <- iq |> 
  left_join(leb)

all
```

or width a function

```{r}
create_tibble <- function(.dat, .variable) {
  .dat |> 
    select(name, {{.variable}}) |> 
    unnest_wider({{.variable}}) |> 
    select(name, score) |> 
    rename({{.variable}} := score)
}

iq <- create_tibble(df, iq)

leb <- create_tibble(df, leb)

all <- iq |> 
  left_join(leb)

all
```
